sourcesContent:
// architecture.component.ts import { Component, OnInit, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { DOCUMENT } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-architecture', templateUrl: './architecture.component.html', styleUrls: ['./architecture.component.css'] }) export class ArchitectureComponent implements OnInit { constructor(@Inject(DOCUMENT) private document: Document) {} ngOnInit() { this.scrollToTop(); // Use the scrolling logic directly } scrollToTop() { this.document.body.scrollTop = 0; this.document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; } }

ARCHITECTURE

Architecture provides an opportunity to add beauty and structure to the world. And we aim to do exactly that! We create innovative designs that are user centric while maintaining harmony with the natural surroundings. In the schematic phase of architecture, we take inputs from the client, followed by research and analysis of the project plan to avoid any future obstacles. Our architects then begin the study of location, size and the interconnection of the spaces. This enables us to create a rough plan of the building. Furthermore, the realistic sketches made by our architects give a solid outlook of how the building will look when built.

PLANNING

In our architectural planning services, we consider and analyze the requirements of our clients to come up with the best approach to either refurbish an existing temple or to design a new one from scratch. We use state of the art technology to do so. With further analysis of the design and site, we recommend any changes for better feasibility. The architectural plans are designed using the latest technology for the most accurate results.

LIASONING

We trust in long-term affiliation and for that we provide liaison services to fulfill your requirements. There are numerous instances during the construction of a temple where the owners are unaware about the legal guidelines of that specific region or territory which might land them in a limbo. In a scenario like this, we serve as the middleman to guide you regarding the construction laws and various documentation processes through the construction period. We’re completely privy to the clauses and laws which are required before kick starting the development site. As a liaison consultant, we recognize which officer to approach, when to approach, as a result simplifying the procedure efficiently. And we have won some of these know-hows with a sizeable experience and marketplace studies, consequently rising as a winner within the competitive market of liaison offerings.

Interior Works

Elevate your living spaces with the expertise of HPSV Studio in interior works. Our dedicated team combines creativity and precision to craft personalized and functional designs that seamlessly integrate style into your surroundings. From concept to execution, HPSV Studio is committed to transforming your space into a haven that reflects your unique taste and enhances your everyday experiences.
